title: Robust Foreign Reserves
description: In 2021, Russia's foreign reserves amounted to approximately $63.57 billion, showcasing its strong financial position globally.

title: High Net Lending Capacity
description: In 2023, Russia's net lending capacity reached 5.86 trillion rubles, indicating a strong fiscal position.

title: Significant Social Insurance Coverage for Lower Quintiles
description: In 2017, social insurance programs covered 64.6% of the population in the 2nd quintile and 61.6% in the 3rd quintile, reflecting a strong social safety net.

title: High Educational Attainment in Doctoral Degrees
description: By 2023, 24.38% of Russia's population aged 25+ held doctoral or equivalent degrees, with females at 25.85% and males at 22.55%.

title: Low Prevalence of Severe Food Insecurity
description: In 2017, only 0.6% of Russia's population experienced severe food insecurity, highlighting effective food security measures.

title: Effective Unemployment Benefits Distribution
description: In 2017, 46.41% of unemployment benefits and ALMP were directed to the poorest quintile, demonstrating targeted social welfare policies.
